faqs.question: How important is RERA registration when buying a 2BHK flat here
faqs.answer: RERA registration is critically important and provides significant legal protection to the buyer. RERA ensures transparency in carpet area calculations, sets deadlines for project completion, and provides a clear mechanism for dispute resolution, protecting your investment from potential fraudulent practices or undue delays by the developer.
